title: Supports
body: If you get into a game with Blue in Spanish instantly report him as he kses all the time and sucks at Thresh but prides himself on it. He also made someone lose their 11 win streak due to how bad they are at positioning and hooking Tahm Kench

replies.body: Why do people even still say "ks"?!

id like to say this as nicely as possible so i dont get band 5eva, but would everybody who complains about ks'ing, kindly just die :) teehee im friendly, friendly statement here, im nice, everyones nice, everythings cool {{champion:36}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:36}}

I swear only noobs complain about KS. KS stands for Kill Secure, and heck yeah, if I am not 100% sure my adc can secure a kill before they escape under tower or whatever, then I'm taking it. If you complain about it afterwards, you sir are a jackass.

That aside, the reasons you gave above are flimsyâ€¦ someone loses their streak because someone else is bad? Sounds like an excuse. Stay off the boards and flame to yourself bud.
You sound like someone who gets wound up too easily
um bud you cant report for ks
If you could kill them yourself maybe he wouldn't have to secure them for you???
I would of but he purposely kses he even prided himself in last hitting a kill from me
